task.title: Getting Books from the Bookstore
task.shortdesc: Now that you’re a new student at the University you’ll want to gather your books for your classes that you are enrolled in.

step.cmd: Wait at the bus stop across the street to catch the bus that will lead you to the bookstore.
Get off the bus at Newman library.
The bookstore building is on the other side of the library.
Enter the bookstore and the employees there can help you find the books you need for the classes you have. In the process you might make a friend or two.
